story_text: Wendy the walrus went to the water to wash.
While waiting, she waved at Willy the whale.
story_images: A walrus named Wendy playing near the water, splashing around as she washes.
Wendy the walrus waving to a friendly whale named Willy who is swimming nearby.

questions.question: What did Wendy the walrus do at the water?
Who did Wendy wave at while waiting?
